title: Role of Mathematics in Science - Schiffer, Bowden (MAA)
description:
Role of Mathematics in Science (Anneli Lax New Mathematical Library)

by Max Schiffer and Leon Bowden.


# Pages     : 207
# ISBN-13   : 9780883856307
# Publisher : Mathematical Association of America, 1984.
# Series    : Anneli Lax New Mathematical Library


Our  primary  aim   is  to  illustrate  the  power   and  elegance  of
mathematical reasoning  in science;  our secondary  aim, to  show also
that science engenders mathematics.


Authors
=======

M. M. Schiffer - earned his PhD at Hebrew University in Jerusalem; went
on to give lectures and teach at Stanford.

Leon  Bowden-  taught at  Stanford  and  the University  of  Victoria,
Canada.


-_-
